* Recode old SAT math section to new SAT math test (10-40 scale)

RECODE old_sat (200=10)
(210=11)
(220=11.5)
(230=12.5)
(240=13)
(250=14)
(260=15)
(270=15.5)
(280=16.5)
(290=17)
(300=17.5)
(310=18)
(320=18)
(330=18.5)
(340=19)
(350=19.5)
(360=20)
(370=20.5)
(380=21)
(390=21.5)
(400=22)
(410=22.5)
(420=23)
(430=23.5)
(440=24)
(450=24.5)
(460=25)
(470=25.5)
(480=25.5)
(490=26)
(500=26.5)
(510=27)
(520=27.5)
(530=28)
(540=28.5)
(550=28.5)
(560=29)
(570=29.5)
(580=30)
(590=30.5)
(600=31)
(610=31.5)
(620=32)
(630=32.5)
(640=33)
(650=33.5)
(660=34.5)
(670=35)
(680=35.5)
(690=36)
(700=36.5)
(710=37)
(720=37.5)
(730=38)
(740=38)
(750=38.5)
(760=39)
(770=39)
(780=39.5)
(790=40)
(800=40) INTO new_sat.



* Usage example:

INPUT PROGRAM.
LOOP id=1 to 10.
END CASE.
END LOOP.
END FILE.
END INPUT PROGRAM.
EXECUTE.

COMPUTE old_sat=TRUNC(RV.UNIFORM(200,800),10).
EXECUTE.

RECODE old_sat (200=10)
(210=11)
(220=11.5)
(230=12.5)
(240=13)
(250=14)
(260=15)
(270=15.5)
(280=16.5)
(290=17)
(300=17.5)
(310=18)
(320=18)
(330=18.5)
(340=19)
(350=19.5)
(360=20)
(370=20.5)
(380=21)
(390=21.5)
(400=22)
(410=22.5)
(420=23)
(430=23.5)
(440=24)
(450=24.5)
(460=25)
(470=25.5)
(480=25.5)
(490=26)
(500=26.5)
(510=27)
(520=27.5)
(530=28)
(540=28.5)
(550=28.5)
(560=29)
(570=29.5)
(580=30)
(590=30.5)
(600=31)
(610=31.5)
(620=32)
(630=32.5)

(650=33.5)
(660=34.5)
(670=35)
(680=35.5)
(690=36)
(700=36.5)
(710=37)
(720=37.5)
(730=38)
(740=38)
(750=38.5)
(760=39)
(770=39)
(780=39.5)
(790=40)
(800=40) INTO new_sat.
EXECUTE.
